review: I absolutely love my Chromecast. I have found myself using it all the time. I currently own two and my kids find them easy to use as well. I wish I could stream my Amazon Instant Video to it as well, but really all the lack of that functionality has done is nudge me in the direction of Vudu or Google Play to buy my digital content. I have pretty much abandoned Amazon for digital media purchases because of this. Overall, we love using Chromeast so much, it's making me think about cutting the cable cord as well.
